item.description:
This is a special festive swing dance featuring many holiday big band arrangements performed by the 18-piece Beantown Swing Orchestra. Even Santa came last year to dance!

There will be a beginner swing dance lesson at 7:30pm with Jay and Sarah Provost. No partner is required, and the followers rotate through the leaders so it's a great chance to meet everyone before the dance begins! The band plays from 9pm to midnight.

Meetup members will get a special hand stamp so you can identify each other during the lesson.

More information about the venue is at www.wannadance.com.

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: Holiday Swing Dance at Swing City in Newton
